subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Since the draft, Mark Sanchez has thrown out the first pitch at a Mets game, used Twitter to update his transition to the N.F.L. and appeared in a GQ photo spread.
snippet: Since the draft, Mark Sanchez has thrown out the first pitch at a Mets game, used Twitter to update his transition to the N.F.L. and appeared in a GQ photo spread.
